TopicTitle: KSP ignores the scroll-wheel speed set on the OS

Articles.Content:
Back on Windows 7 you could go into a special setting (in the mouse settings) that basically told it "These programs will ignore the OS's scroll wheel settings and try to do their own thing" and you could tell Windows to force the proper scroll wheel sensitivity on them.  I've always had to do this because I find the default wheel sensitivity is WAY too high in game.  I just finished upgrading to Windows 10, and I can't find that setting anymore.


Looking into it a bit, I actually found what I was looking for.  It was the Microsoft Mouse and Keyboard Center. It helps reel in badly behaving programs.  But while I have this thread up, I still want to ask.  There must be a way in-game to set the wheel sensitivity.  If so, where is it?
